Name: team_availability
Description: A team's status must be 'Available' to be assigned to a new project

Name: sprint_goal_must_be_met
Description: The Sprint Goal achievement_status must be 'Achieved' for the sprint to be considered successful

Name: worker_availability
Description: A worker can only be assigned to tasks if their availability is > 0

Name: budget_not_exceeded
Description: The total cost of a project must not exceed its allocated budget

Name: story_points_per_sprint
Description: The total story points in a Sprint Backlog must not exceed 1.5x the team's velocity

Name: cross_functional_team
Description: Each team must have at least one member with each required role (e.g.

Name: definition_of_done
Description: A User Story can only be marked 'Done' if all its acceptance criteria are met

Name: no_active_blockers
Description: A task cannot be marked 'Done' if it has an active blocker (status != 'Resolved')

Name: feature_dependency
Description: Feature B cannot start until Feature A is complete

Name: maximum_team_size
Description: A team cannot have more than 10 members
